Agitation Marked restlessness and excessive motor activity, accompanied by anxiety. Akathisia A subjective sense of restlessness, often accompanied by observed excessive movements (e.g. fidgety movements of the legs, rocking from foot to foot, pacing, inability to sit or stand still).
